articles.author: Andy Hampson
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo's Euros dream ends as Thorgan Hazard screamer sees Belgium edge Portugal - Independent.ie
articles.description: Thorgan Hazard netted with a wonder strike as Belgium ended Portugal’s reign as European champions with a hard-fought 1-0 victory in Seville.
articles.content:
Thorgan Hazard netted with a wonder strike as Belgium ended Portugals reign as European champions with a hard-fought 1-0 victory in Seville.
The younger Hazard brother settled a slow-burning Euro 20… [+2860 chars]
